EmailTemplate.subject: The DU-875 Display Upgrade for Global Express is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.pentastaraviation.com/]]>
The DU-875 Upgrade for Global Express by Honeywell and Pentastar Aviation Improve your pilot’s view and add instant value to your aircraft blue book value with the DU-875 upgrade for Global Express by Honeywell and Pentastar Aviation.
Replace one or all six of your DU-870 displays and receive the many benefits that come with this easy and cost-effective upgrade:
- Reduced cost of ownership
- Increased display reliability
- Reduced weight
- Maintains full cockpit integration - New 24 month display warranty
- Growth plan that takes advantage of future technologies and applications
Avoid obsolescence and save up to $240,000* when you take advantage of this limited time trade-in credit. Contact Pentastar Aviation today to learn more about the DU-875 upgrade for Global Express.
CONTACT US <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/the-du-875-upgrade-for-global-express-by-honeywell-and-pentastar-aviation]]>
*Savings are based on operator upgrading all six (6) displays to the DU-875 LCD display.
